text:
="preserve">Hernán Claret Alemán Pérez (21 May 1955 – 7 July 2020) was a Venezuelan Acción Democrática politician. He was the National Assembly representing the state of Zulia from 2011 until his death. Alemán was Mayor of Cabimas from 1989 to 1996 and again from 2000 to 2008.
Alemán died from COVID-19 in Cabimas on 7 July 2020, aged 65.
